titleInfo.title: View of Maurelian and the Bell Tower from Ave Maria Hall

mods.abstract: Arches are a feature of the architecture of Christian Brothers College (and University). An arch from Ave Maria Hall framed the view of the entrance to campus with the Bell Tower and Maurelian Hall in the background.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
